definition: grain that has begun to ripen/variant of 衹|只[zhi3]
classifier for birds and certain animals, one of a pair, some utensils, vessels etc
to read/to study/reading of word (i.e. pronunciation), similar to 拼音[pin1 yin1]

pinyin: ke3 ca1 xie3 ke3 bian1 cheng2 zhi1 du2 cun2 chu3 qi4
containing_words.word: 可擦写可编程只读存储器

sentences.english: Caching works best for read-only data.
sentences.chinese: 缓存非常适合于只读数据。

sentences.english: If they are read-only databases then this would not be an issue.
sentences.chinese: 但是如果这些数据库是只读的，那么这就不成问题。

sentences.english: You are just in Grade 3. What are you going to do?
sentences.chinese: 你只读到三年级，打算做什么呢？

sentences.english: Recovering from the loss of a datafile that belongs to a readonly tablespace
sentences.chinese: 从属于只读表空间的数据文件的丢失中恢复。

sentences.english: A read-only list where the project does official announcements.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个发布官方通告的只读邮件列表。

sentences.english: The replication is best suited for read-only data with fewer updates.
sentences.chinese: 复制是最适合用于较少更新的只读数据。

sentences.english: The first line is a read-only display area.
sentences.chinese: 第一行是一个只读显示区域。

sentences.english: In the first place, who says we only read the 1848 text?
sentences.chinese: 首先，谁说我们只读1848文本？

sentences.english: This account contains sub-accounts. What would you like to do with these sub-accounts?
sentences.chinese: 该帐户含有无法删除的只读交易。

sentences.english: ROA is largely for read-only data.
Blame only themselves to blame "book, two sages heart read-only window his ears."
sentences.chinese: 怪只怪自己“一心只读圣贤书，两耳不闻窗外事。”

sentences.english: "Two outside the window, his ears heart read-only sages book" already do not apply.
sentences.chinese: “两耳不闻窗外事，一心只读圣贤书”已不适用。

sentences.english: The list is read-only or has a fixed size.
sentences.chinese: 该列表为只读，或具有固定大小。

sentences.english: Respond time of mobile read-only transactions is greatly improved.
sentences.chinese: 响应时间的移动只读交易的是，大大提高。

sentences.english: These tools are not simply read-only views; they can also be edited.
sentences.chinese: 这些工具不仅是只读的视图，它们还是可编辑的。

sentences.english: However, read-only access has its limitations.
sentences.chinese: 但是，只读访问有其局限性。

definition: to read/to study/reading of word (i.e. pronunciation), similar to 拼音[pin1 yin1]
to read again/to review (a lesson etc)
to read a book/to study/to attend school
colloquial (rather than literary) pronunciation of a Chinese character
Four Books, namely: the Great Learning 大學|大学, the Doctrine of the Mean 中庸, the Analects of Confucius 論語|论语, and Mencius 孟子
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]
Guwen Guanzhi, an anthology of essays written in Literary Chinese, compiled and edited by Wu Chucai and Wu Diaohou of Qing dynasty
The Analects of Confucius 孔子[Kong3 zi3]
lit. not requiring a detailed understanding (idiom); only looking for an overview/not bothered with the details/superficial/content with shallow understanding
